measured_by: post-trial slider rating scale of stimulus-independence
justification: "Following the response, participants were required to estimate how much their response choice was guided by the dot-motion... a scale was presented for 3000 ms and participants could move the slider... One end of the scale indicated absolute independence … while the other indicated complete dependence."

measured_by: proportion of responses congruent to motion direction
justification: "Our analyses of objective freedom of choice centred on two dependent measures: (1) the proportion of responses made congruent to motion direction for each instruction…"

"Our analyses of objective freedom of choice centred on… (2) our measure of the association between different response types and stimulus strength… we reverse correlated these normalised distributions according to response type."
